Text.val: 13.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
14.04.2003 SH SCR 3297 Tuned DSQL in tasks "How many records exist" and
24.03.2003 RR -> SCR3195 Implementation of shortcut handling
09.10.2002 SH Add new paramater PO.INVO_DEBC_NO will be updated
05.08.2002 SH Add new parameter PO.INVO_DATE, delete first parameter
22.07.2002 SH Select only invoices with INVO_AACTUALI <> 0
10.07.2002 SH Insert "FOR READ ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS" to DSQL
-- If only 1 record exist, than the OutputParameters are automaticliy
-- filled, with the values of this record, otherwise the selection-

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1 where INVO_ADMNO= :2 and INVO_CLNTNO= :3 and INVO_INVOICENO = ':4' and (INVO_AACTUALI <>0 and INVO_AACTUALI between :5 and :6) FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

select INVO_NO, cast(INVO_AACTUALI as decimal (18,2)), INVO_CURRENCY, INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO, INVO_DEBC_DEBC, INVO_DEBH_NO, INVO_DEBC_NO, INVO_INVDATE from :1 where INVO_ADMNO= :2 and INVO_CLNTNO= :3 and INVO_INVOICENO = ':4' and (INVO_AACTUALI <>0 and INVO_AACTUALI BETWEEN :5 and :6) FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS
